Uses of Interface
io.sf.carte.doc.style.css.CSSDeclarationRule

Packages that use CSSDeclarationRule
Package Description
io.sf.carte.doc.style.css
This package and its subpackages provide an implementation of the CSS Object Model API.
io.sf.carte.doc.style.css.om
Implementation classes for the CSS Object Model API.

  • Uses of CSSDeclarationRule in io.sf.carte.doc.style.css

    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    interface  CSSKeyframeRule
    The CSSKeyframeRule interface represents the style rule for a single key.
    interface  CSSMarginRule
    Margin rule.
    interface  ExtendedCSSFontFaceRule
    An extended CSS font-face rule.
    interface  ExtendedCSSPageRule
    An extended CSS @page rule.
    interface  ExtendedCSSStyleRule
    An extended CSS style rule.
    Methods in io.sf.carte.doc.style.css that return CSSDeclarationRule
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    CSSDeclarationRule ExtendedCSSStyleSheet.createViewportRule()
    Create a CSSViewportRule compatible with this implementation.
    CSSDeclarationRule ExtendedCSSStyleDeclaration.getParentRule()
    Retrieves the CSS rule that contains this declaration block.
    Methods in io.sf.carte.doc.style.css with parameters of type CSSDeclarationRule
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    StyleDeclarationErrorHandler CSSStyleSheetFactory.createStyleDeclarationErrorHandler​(CSSDeclarationRule rule)
    Create a new StyleDeclarationErrorHandler for the given style rule.

    Classes in io.sf.carte.doc.style.css.om that implement CSSDeclarationRule
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  BaseCSSDeclarationRule
    Abstract class to be inherited by CSS rules which have a CSSStyleDeclaration.
    class  CounterStyleRule
    CSS counter-style rule implementation.
    class  CSSStyleDeclarationRule
    Abstract class to be inherited by CSS rules which have both selectors and a CSSStyleDeclaration.
    class  FontFaceRule
    Implementation of CSSFontFaceRule.
    class  KeyframeRule
    CSSKeyframeRule implementation.
    class  MarginRule
    Implementation of CSSMarginRule.
    class  PageRule
    Implementation of CSSPageRule.
    class  StyleRule
    CSS style rule.
    class  ViewportRule
    CSS Viewport rule implementation.
